p: The consumer acceptance of the product was studied using 10 panelists with age ranging from 25 to 40 years. Panelists were trained based on the method described by Ares, Parentelli, Gámbaro, Lareo, and Lema ( 2006). Mushrooms were served in closed, odorless plastic containers at room temperature. After opening polyethylene bags, evaluations were performed within 2 hr in order to avoid loss of off‐odors. The overall acceptability based on color, texture, and percent opened caps were done by round‐table basis using four‐point scale where 1 = poor, 2 = fair, 3 = good, and 4 = excellent (Jiang et al., 2011).
